name: Countdown
description: When a nurse downloads an app that claims to predict the moment a person will die, it tells her she only has three days to live. With the clock ticking and a figure haunting her, she must find a way to save her life before time ru...

review.author: fayelovesgreenday
review.heading: Better than expected
review.reviewBody: I was expecting this to be awful and especially in the first 5 mins but it was actually really scary and the acting was decent for a horror movie, if you are looking for a way to kill time with your friends i definitely recommend you go see this movie, it was pretty good

keywords: boss sexually harassing employee,sexually harassed by one's boss,app,violence,race against time
